verses.text: Then \w Jerubbaal|strong="H3378"\w*, who \add is\add* \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him, rose up \w early|strong="H7925"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* beside the well of \w Harod|strong="H5878"\w*: so that the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w* were on the north \w side|strong="H6828"\w* of them, by the \w hill|strong="H1389"\w* of \w Moreh|strong="H4176"\w*, in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w*, The \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add are\add* with thee \add are\add* too \w many|strong="H7227"\w* for me to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w* into their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, lest \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w vaunt|strong="H6286"\w* themselves against me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Mine own \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* hath \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* me.

Now therefore go \w to|strong="H4994"\w*, \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Whosoever \add is\add* \w fearful|strong="H3373"\w* and \w afraid|strong="H2730"\w*, let him \w return|strong="H7725"\w* and depart \w early|strong="H6852"\w* from \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*. And there \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*; and there \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w*, The \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add are\add* yet \add too\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*; bring them \w down|strong="H3381"\w* unto the \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and I will \w try|strong="H6884"\w* them for thee there: and it shall be, \add that\add* of whom I \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, This shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with thee, the same shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with thee; and of whomsoever I \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, This shall not \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with thee, the same shall not \w go|strong="H3212"\w*.

So he brought \w down|strong="H3381"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* unto the \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w*, Every one that \w lappeth|strong="H3952"\w* of the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* with his \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*, as a \w dog|strong="H3611"\w* \w lappeth|strong="H3952"\w*, him shalt thou \w set|strong="H3322"\w* by himself; likewise every one that boweth \w down|strong="H3766"\w* upon his \w knees|strong="H1290"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

And the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of them that \w lapped|strong="H3952"\w*, \add putting\add* their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, were \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*: but all the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* bowed \w down|strong="H3766"\w* upon their \w knees|strong="H1290"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w*, By the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* that \w lapped|strong="H3952"\w* will I \w save|strong="H3467"\w* you, and \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w* into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: and let all the \add other\add* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* unto his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

So the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w victuals|strong="H6720"\w* in their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and their \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w*: and he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \add the rest of\add* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* unto his \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and \w retained|strong="H2388"\w* those \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*: and the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* was beneath him in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass the same \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, get thee \w down|strong="H3381"\w* unto the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*; for I have \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* it into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

But if thou \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* to go \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, \w go|strong="H3381"\w* thou with \w Phurah|strong="H6513"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*:

And thou shalt \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* what they \w say|strong="H1696"\w*; and \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* shall thine \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* be \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* to go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* unto the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*. Then went he \w down|strong="H3381"\w* with \w Phurah|strong="H6513"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* unto the \w outside|strong="H7097"\w* of the armed \w men|strong="H2571"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*.\f + \fr 7.11 \ft armed men: or, ranks by five\f*

And the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w* and the \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w* and all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w lay|strong="H5307"\w* along in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* like \w grasshoppers|strong="H0697"\w* for \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w*; and their \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* \add were\add* without \w number|strong="H4557"\w*, as the \w sand|strong="H2344"\w* by the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H8193"\w* for \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w*.

And when \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, behold, \add there was\add* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w told|strong="H5608"\w* a \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* unto his \w fellow|strong="H7453"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, I \w dreamed|strong="H2492"\w* a \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*, and, lo, a \w cake|strong="H6742"\w* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w tumbled|strong="H2015"\w* into the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto a \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* it that it \w fell|strong="H5307"\w*, and \w overturned|strong="H2015"\w* it, that the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* lay \w along|strong="H5307"\w*.

And his \w fellow|strong="H7453"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* nothing else save the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w*, a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \add for\add* into his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* hath \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, and all the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*.

¶ And it was \add so\add*, when \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w telling|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*, and the \w interpretation|strong="H7667"\w* thereof, that he \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w*, and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* into the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*; for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*.\f + \fr 7.15 \ft interpretation: Heb. breaking\f*

And he \w divided|strong="H2673"\w* the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \add into\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w companies|strong="H7218"\w*, and he \w put|strong="H5414"\w* a \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* in every \w man’s hand|strong="H3027"\w*, with \w empty|strong="H7386"\w* \w pitchers|strong="H3537"\w*, and \w lamps|strong="H3940"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* the \w pitchers|strong="H3537"\w*.\f + \fr 7.16 \ft a trumpet…: Heb. trumpets in the hand of all of them\f*\f + \fr 7.16 \ft lamps: or, firebrands, or, torches\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Look|strong="H7200"\w* on me, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* likewise: and, behold, when I \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w outside|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, it shall be \add that\add*, as I \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, so shall ye \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

When I \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* with a \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, I and all that \add are\add* with me, then \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* ye the \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w* also on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w* of all the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \add The sword\add* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and of \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w*.

¶ So \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w*, and the \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* that \add were\add* with him, \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w outside|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* in the \w beginning|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w middle|strong="H8484"\w* \w watch|strong="H0821"\w*; and they had \w but|strong="H0389"\w* \w newly|strong="H6965"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* the \w watch|strong="H8104"\w*: and they \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* the \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w*, and \w brake|strong="H5310"\w* the \w pitchers|strong="H3537"\w* that \add were\add* in their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

And the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w companies|strong="H7218"\w* \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* the \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w*, and \w brake|strong="H7665"\w* the \w pitchers|strong="H3537"\w*, and \w held|strong="H2388"\w* the \w lamps|strong="H3940"\w* in their \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and the \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w* in their \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* to \w blow|strong="H8628"\w* \add withal:\add* and they \w cried|strong="H7121"\w*, The \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and of \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w*.

And they \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* in his place round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*: and all the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* \w ran|strong="H7323"\w*, and \w cried|strong="H7321"\w*, and \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*.

And the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* the \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* every \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* against his \w fellow|strong="H7453"\w*, even throughout all the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*: and the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* to \w Beth-shittah|strong="H1029"\w* in \w Zererath|strong="H6888"\w*, \add and\add* to the \w border|strong="H8193"\w* of \w Abel-meholah|strong="H0065"\w*, unto \w Tabbath|strong="H2888"\w*.\f + \fr 7.22 \ft in: or, toward\f*\f + \fr 7.22 \ft border: Heb. lip\f*

And the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H6817"\w* out of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, and out of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w*, and out of all \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, and \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w*.

¶ And \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* throughout all \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3920"\w* before them the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* unto \w Beth-barah|strong="H1012"\w* and \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*. Then all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H6817"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3920"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* unto \w Beth-barah|strong="H1012"\w* and \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

And they \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w Midianites|strong="H4080"\w*, \w Oreb|strong="H6159"\w* and \w Zeeb|strong="H2062"\w*; and they \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w Oreb|strong="H6159"\w* upon the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w Oreb|strong="H6159"\w*, and \w Zeeb|strong="H2062"\w* they \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* at the \w winepress|strong="H3342"\w* of \w Zeeb|strong="H2062"\w*, and \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Oreb|strong="H6159"\w* and \w Zeeb|strong="H2062"\w* to \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.
